question: The major focus of the Integrated Processing Development Scheme related to textile sector is __?
option3: Address the environmental concerns of textile Industry
option4: Enhance access to credit for small weavers
answer: Address the environmental concerns of textile Industry
explanation: To address the environmental concerns of the textile industry and to improve the effluent treatment infrastructure, the finance minister declared a new scheme called the Integrated Processing Development Scheme with an outlay of Rs 500 crore. It will be implemented in the 12th Five Year Plan. An allocation of Rs 50 crore has been made for the scheme for 2013-14.
